title: acd: race needs fixing
body:
go install -race turned this up

```
rclone --stats=1s --bwlimit=20k copy /path/to/files acd:path
```

This is because we return the token in beginCall, but the works of the function takes longer than a pace interval because of the bandwidth limit so another go routine has the token by the time endCall is called.

Could fix by returning the token in endCall - that would serialise all connections though so won't work.

Probably needs a mutex on pacer to protect the writable variables - this probably only needs to be taken in endCall() - and for the whole of that.
